DOC.brief_summary: This protocol series descriptive analysis conduct within cohort patient use linagliptin , dipeptidyl peptidase-4 ( DPP-4 ) inhibitor , oral non-insulin injected hypoglycemic medication May 2011 July 2012 . Understanding 1 ) exist utilization pattern linagliptin , sitagliptin , saxagliptin , oral non-insulin injected hypoglycemic agent ( 2 ) difference utilization pattern agent help design , analysis interpretation comparative effectiveness safety study linagliptin , DPP-4 inhibitor , agent . The study provide overview exist utilization pattern linagliptin , dipeptidyl peptidase-4 ( DPP-4 ) inhibitor , oral non-insulin injected hypoglycemic agent , order detect potential selective prescribing pattern might lead channel bias .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Non-insulin Injected Hypoglycemic Therapy Utilization Patterns
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus dispense oral noninsulin inject hypoglycemic medication May 2011 June 2012 least 6 month enrolment database precede date first dispense Exclusion criterion : age < 18 miss ambiguous age sex information least one diagnosis type 1 diabetes mellitus secondary diabetes
